here in store well shall be able to find various crop types and there descriptions,but we are sorry for the inconveniences, we are unable to find the details on each crop types but still we can find a way to copy up with the few available species and animals. vegetables are short times,they take few months to grow and generate money.

a tomato plant here looks to be at one month tomatoes may take 3-4month in the field and this makes them short timers in the process,the produce 30-70 fruits on each entire tree if well looked after,constant spraying is essential in the growth of these tomatoes,they exist in different types hence making them more wide range of crops to work with

farm animals are also part of the agricultural process they inclue poutry,pigs,cows,goats and sheep though not limited to the following,they need esential care to increase they produce.that is poor feeding f farm animals may result into undesired results at the end of the production process.keep farm animal structures clean and do regulary check ups and isolate sick animals
